item.title: Sonoma stage left
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Link to the video on Youtube. I filmed this with my Sony Ericsson K610i so the quality is so-so. Originally I had filmed it landscape mode, I thought I could convert it in iMovie but the only options I could find were plug-ins for iMovie you had to pay for (booo). I came across this post over at macosxhints to use BitPlayer (free! w00t!) to rotate the movie.
